title: Counting: Objects (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Objects subcategory within Counting. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: There are eight pens on the table.
cards.romaji: Hachihon(happon) no borupen ga teburu no ue ni arimasu.
cards.japanese: 八本（はっぽん）のボールペンがテーブルの上にあります。
